20550.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>Well here we are again. I hope you aren't having
<pc> clean up more of your financial
messes under the guise of training.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20550.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「修行にかこつけて　また　何か
　<pc>に　ロクでもないことを
　させようとしてんじゃないでしょうね？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20550.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 수련이라는 명목으로
　<pc>한테 또 이상한 짓을
　시키려는 거 아닙니까?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20550.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>你是不是又想假借修行之名，
让<pc>做什么
不正经的事啊？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20550.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>你是不是又想假借修行之名，
讓<pc>做什麼
不正經的事情啊？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20551.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Oh great, I see you're back again and
still cant keep to your own business.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20551.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「……チッ！
　うるせーのが　来やがった。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20551.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: ……쳇!
　시끄러운 녀석이 나타났군.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20551.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……啧！
啰嗦的家伙又来了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20551.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……嘖！
囉嗦的傢伙又來了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20552.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><pc> if he tries to sell you off for
drinking money again let me know.
You shouldn't have to endure that twice...<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20552.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「<pc>。この間みたいに
　借金のカタに　売られそうになったりしたら
　オレに　相談してくれよ。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20552.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 저번처럼
　빚을 갚기 위해 널 이용하려고 하면
　나한테 말해.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20552.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><pc>，你要是像上次一样
差点就被卖掉还债的话，
记得要找我商量啊。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20552.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><pc>，你要是像上次一樣
差點就被賣掉還債的話，
記得要找我商量啊。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20553.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Bull shit! I wouldn't do that.
Especially with <pc>'s fans bringing
me all of this work now.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20553.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「ちげえって！　今回は　なんと
　<pc>のファンからの　ご指名で
　仕事の依頼が　飛び込んだのさ。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20553.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 아냐! 이번에는
　<pc>의 팬이란 사람이
　이 녀석한테 일을 의뢰한 거라고.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20553.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>就说不是了！这次居然是有
<pc>的崇拜者点名
要委托他工作呢。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20553.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>就說不是了！這次居然是有
<pc>的崇拜者點名
要委託他工作呢。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20554.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>Hmm. They hired you out of nowhere without
providing their name or the nature of the job.
That's pretty much the definition of suspicious.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20554.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。名前も名乗らずに　呼びだして
　仕事の内容も　現地で説明か……
　ずいぶん　ウサン臭い　依頼だな。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20554.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 이름도 밝히지 않고 불러내서는
　의뢰 내용도 현지에서 설명하겠다라……
　수상하기 짝이 없는 의뢰군.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20554.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……嗯，不自报姓名就叫人过去，
连工作内容都要到时候才说明……
这个委托感觉相当可疑呢。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20554.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……嗯，不自報姓名就叫人過去，
連工作內容都要到時候才說明……
這個委託感覺相當可疑呢。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20555.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>I'm sure they have their reasons.
And besides, who am we to turn down requests
from our loyal fans?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20555.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「まあ　むこうにも都合が　あるのかもな？
　それより　ご指名で　仕事を依頼してくる
　ファンができるなんて　たいしたもんだ！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20555.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 그쪽도 사정이 있을 테니까.
　그보다 널 지명해서 일을 의뢰하는
　팬이 생기다니 굉장한걸!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20555.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>哎，反正人家也是有他们的原因吧。
重点是居然有崇拜者指名
要委托你工作，你还真厉害呢！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20555.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>哎，反正人家也是有他們的原因吧。
重點是居然有崇拜者指名
要委託你工作，你還真厲害呢！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20556.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>Well, regardless. Go ahead and meet with the client.
Keep your head on a swivel and if it seems too
sketchy then you should pull the plug. <stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20556.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「とりあえず　依頼人に会ってみて
　あんまり　怪しい依頼なら　断ればいいさ。
　<pc>が　自分で　判断するといい。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20556.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 일단 의뢰인을 만나 보고
　정 수상하다 싶으면 그때 거절하면 되니까.
　{pc}|hpp(이,가) 직접 판단하도록 해.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20556.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>总之，你就去见见对方，
如果觉得有问题再拒绝委托就好了。
<pc>你自己判断吧。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20556.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>總之，你就去見見對方，
如果覺得有問題再拒絕委託就好了。
<pc>你自己判斷吧。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20557.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Dammit, Sainz. Stop confusing my pupil.
<pc> is under my tutelage, not yours!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20557.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「……ぐぬぬっ。おのれ　セインズ。
　これじゃ　誰が　<pc>の師匠か
　わかんねーじゃねえか！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20557.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: ……끄으응, 세인즈 저 자식.
　이러면 누가 <pc>의 스승인지
　알 수가 없잖아!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20557.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……唔唔唔，赛因兹，你这混账，
你以为谁才是
<pc>的师父啊！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20557.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……唔唔唔，賽因茲，你這混帳，
你以為誰才是
<pc>的師父啊！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20558.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>You must be <pc>.
Thank you for coming all this  way.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20558.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「おお　これは　<pc>選手。
　このような遠方まで　よく来てくださいました。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20558.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 선수님.
　이 먼 곳까지 정말 잘 오셨습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20558.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>哦哦，这不是<pc>选手吗？
感谢你不辞辛劳，大老远跑来这里。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20558.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>喔喔，這不是<pc>選手嗎？
感謝你不辭辛勞，大老遠跑來這裡。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20559.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>I am your contact for someone who, for certain
reasons, insists on remaining anonymous. Suffice to
say, they are the fan who requested your assistance.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20559.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「私は　ワケあって名前は　明らかにできない
　さる人物の　代理人を務める者です。
　ええ。あなたのファンだという方のことですよ。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20559.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 전 사정이 있어 이름을 밝힐 수 없는
　어떤 분의 대리로 온 사람입니다.
　예, 당신의 팬이라는 바로 그분이죠.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20559.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>我们这位委托人出于一些原因
不便透露身份，我是他的代理人。
是啊，委托人是你的一位崇拜者。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20559.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>我們這位委託人出於一些原因
不便透露身分，我是他的代理人。
是啊，委託人是你的一位崇拜者。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20560.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Well then. Let's get down to business.
The request is not a difficult one, but it
requires the unique skills of a battlemaster.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20560.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「では　さっそく　仕事の話に入りましょう。
　今回の依頼は　難しいものではないのですが
　バトルマスターにしか　できないもので……。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20560.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그럼 바로 일 얘기로 넘어가죠.
　이번 의뢰는 어려운 일은 아닙니다만
　배틀 마스터만이 할 수 있는 일이라서요…….<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20560.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那么，事不宜迟，我们就进入正题吧。
这次的委托并不困难，
但非得要战斗大师不可……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20560.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那麼，事不宜遲，我們就進入正題吧。
這次的委託並不困難，
但非得要戰鬥大師不可……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20561.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Therefore, due to your prowess, my Lord has
chosen you for this specific task...<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20561.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「そこで　我が主の意向により
　あなたに　白羽の矢が立ったというわけです。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20561.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그래서 제 주인님의 뜻에 따라
　당신이 발탁된 거죠.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20561.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>因此，根据我主人的意愿
就选中了你。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20561.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>因此，根據我主人的意願
就選中了你。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20562.en:
The <%sev_que_name0> that appears in this cave drops a unique flower called "Moonlight Flower." It only drops the flower when it is
defeated by using the skill Clap Trap.
20562.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「この洞くつに出現する　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は
　とうこん討ちを使って　とどめをさされた時だけ
　月光の花という　めずらしい花を落とします。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20562.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 이 동굴에 나타나는 {%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(은,는)
　투혼 치기로 최후의 일격을 가하면
　달빛 꽃이라는 진귀한 꽃을 떨어뜨립니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20562.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>只有用斗魂搏打
给予出没在这洞窟里的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>致命一击时，
它才会掉落稀有的月光花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20562.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>只有用鬥魂搏打
給予出沒在這洞窟裡的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>致命一擊時，
牠才會掉落稀有的月光花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20563.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>These flowers bloom in three distinct colors:
red, white, and blue. The task requested of you
is to collect all three colors of these flowers.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20563.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「この花には　赤　白　青の３色がありまして。
　あなたへの依頼というのは　この３色の花を　
　すべて　集めてほしいというものなのです。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20563.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그 꽃은 붉은색, 하얀색, 푸른색 3가지가 있는데
　당신은 그 3가지 색 꽃을
　모두 모아 주시면 됩니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20563.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>这种花共有红、白、蓝３种颜色。
你的工作，就是要集齐
这３种颜色的花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20563.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>這種花共有紅、白、藍３種顏色。
你的工作，就是要集齊
這３種顏色的花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20564.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>If you succeed we are prepared to
offer you a reward in the form of a
<%sev_fee_item_a>.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20564.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「報酬には　<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>という
　バトルマスター専用の
　ヘッドバンドを　用意しております。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20564.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 보수로는 {%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A}|hpp(이라는,라는)
　배틀 마스터 전용
　헤어밴드를 준비했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20564.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>我这边准备了
<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>这种战斗大师专用的头带
作为报酬。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20564.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>我這邊準備了
<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>這種戰鬥大師專用的頭帶
作為報酬。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47405.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>So... Will you accept the challenge to collect
one of each color of Moonlight Flowers?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47405.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「……どうでしょう？
　３色の月光の花　集めてもらえますか？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47405.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: ……어떠십니까?
　3가지 색 꽃을 모아 와 주시겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47405.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>……怎么样？
能帮我收集３种颜色的月光花吗？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47405.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>……怎麼樣？
能幫我收集３種顏色的月光花嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
You have been offered a quest.
Would you like to accept it? 
<select>
Accept
Stop
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

47406.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>If you succeed a <%sev_fee_item_a> shall be your
reward. Will you accept our request to gather
one of each color of Moonlight Flowers?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47406.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「報酬には　<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>を
　用意しております。どうでしょう？
　３色の月光の花　集めてもらえますか？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20565.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Thank you. You are as exceptional as
we had hoped you might be.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20565.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「おお　ありがとうございます！
　さすがは　我が主の見込んだ方ですな。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20565.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 오오, 감사합니다!
　역시 주인님의 지명을 받은 분답군요.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20565.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>哦哦，谢谢你！
真不愧是我主人看中的人选。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20565.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>喔喔，謝謝你！
真不愧是我主人看中的人選。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20566.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Now, if you will excuse me for a moment, I have
some work attend to. Return here once you
have collected one of each color of Moonlight Flower.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20566.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「それでは　私は　いったん　
　失礼させていただきます。
　いろいろと　忙しい身でしてね。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20566.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그럼 전 이만 실례하겠습니다.
　이래저래 바빠서요.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20566.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那我就
先离开了。
不好意思，我有很多事要忙。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20566.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那我就
先離開了。
不好意思，我有很多事要忙。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20567.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>I shall await your return. Please see me again
once you have completed the requested task.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20567.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「月光の花が　３色　集まった頃に
　また　ここへ来ますので　あなたも
　こちらまで　戻ってきてください。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20567.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 3가지 색 달빛 꽃을 다 모으셨을 무렵에
　다시 이곳으로 올 테니
　당신도 이곳으로 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20567.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>等你集齐３种颜色的月光花时
我会再过来，到时也请你
回到这边。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20567.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>等你集齊３種顏色的月光花時
我會再過來，到時也請你
回到這邊。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20568.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>I shall see you later. Thank you very
much for your cooperation.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20568.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「それでは　また後ほど。
　くれぐれも　よろしくお願いしますよ。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20568.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그럼 나중에 뵙죠.
　모쪼록 잘 부탁드립니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20568.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那就先这样，待会儿再见吧。
这件事拜托你了。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20568.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那就先這樣，待會兒再見吧。
這件事拜託你了。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

20569.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Oh, thanks but it seems like you already have
a lot of other requests to fulfill first.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20569.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「おお　ありがとうございます！
　……と言いたいところですが　どうやら
　他に依頼を　たくさん　抱えている様子。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20569.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 오오, 감사합니다!
　……라고 하고 싶지만
　보아하니 다른 의뢰가 많은 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20569.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>哦哦，谢谢你！
……我是很想这么说，但看来
你已经接了很多其他任务。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20569.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>喔喔，謝謝你！
……我是很想這麼說，但看來
你已經接了很多其他任務。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20570.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Yes. You seem to be as exceptional as our master
has made you out to be.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20570.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「さすがは　我が主の見込んだ方。
　引く手あまたということですな。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20570.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 역시 주인님의 지명을 받은 분답군요.
　찾는 분들이 많은 모양입니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20570.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>真不愧是我主人看中的人选，
还真受欢迎呢。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20570.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>真不愧是我主人看中的人選，
還真受歡迎呢。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20571.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>If you still want to help please complete
your other requests quickly amd return here
when you're finished.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20571.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「さあ　はやく　他の頼みごとを片付けてきて
　また　ここまで　来てくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20571.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 자, 어서 다른 의뢰를 처리하고
　다시 이곳으로 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20571.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那就请你尽快解决掉其他的工作
再过来吧。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20571.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那就請你盡快解決掉其他的工作
再過來這裡吧。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20572.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Oh, my! Now that's a problem, isn't it?
 I can't simply give up however because
 one adventurer turns down the request...<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20572.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「なんと！　それは　困りましたな。
　私も　主の手前　断られたからといって
　はい　そうですかとは　退けないのですが……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20572.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그럴 수가! 난감하게 됐군요.
　저도 주인님의 분부라
　순순히 물러설 수는 없는지라……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20572.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>天啊！这可麻烦了。
如果我被你拒绝一次就死心回去，
那我也很难向我主人交代啊……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20572.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>天啊！這可麻煩了。
如果我被你拒絕一次就死心回去，
那我也很難向我主人交代啊……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20573.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Well there's no point in hanging around here
ot thats the decision you've made. If you
change your mind please come back.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20573.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「しかし　ここで　にらみあってても仕方ない。
　もし　考えが変わったら　また　来てください。
　私は　それを信じて　待っていますよ。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20573.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 하지만 당신을 붙잡고 있어 봤자 소용없겠죠.
　혹시라도 마음이 바뀌면 다시 와 주십시오.
　당신을 믿고 기다리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20573.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>但在这里僵着也不是办法。
若你改变主意，就再过来吧。
我在这里等你，相信你会来的。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20573.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>但在這裡僵著也不是辦法。
若你改變主意，就再過來吧。
我在這裡等你，相信你會來的。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20574.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Oh hey, you're back.
Are you looking to accept my lords request now?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20574.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「おお。来てくださったということは
　今度こそ　我が主からの依頼を
　引き受けてくれるつもりなのですね？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20574.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 오오, 다시 와 주셨다는 건
　이번에야말로 저희 주인님의 의뢰를
　맡아 줄 마음이 드셨단 뜻이군요?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20574.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>哦，你既然过来，
就表示这次
要接受我主人的委托了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20574.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>喔，你既然過來，
就表示這次
要接受我主人的委託了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20575.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>The <%sev_que_name0> that appears in. this cave
drops a unique flower called the "Moonlight Flower"
only when it is beaten using the Clap Trap technique.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20575.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「この洞くつに出現する　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は
　とうこん討ちを使って　とどめをさされた時だけ
　月光の花という　めずらしい花を落とします。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20575.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 이 동굴에 나타나는 {%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(은,는)
　투혼 치기로 최후의 일격을 가하면
　달빛 꽃이라는 진귀한 꽃을 떨어뜨립니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20575.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>只有用斗魂搏打
给予出没在这洞窟里的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>致命一击时，
它才会掉落稀有的月光花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20575.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>只有用鬥魂搏打
給予出沒在這洞窟裡的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>致命一擊時，
牠才會掉落稀有的月光花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20576.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>These flowers come in three colors:
red, white, and blue. The request is to
collect one of each color of these flowers.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20576.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「この花には　赤　白　青の３色がありまして。
　あなたへの依頼というのは　この３色の花を　
　すべて　集めてほしいというものなのです。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20576.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그 꽃은 붉은색, 하얀색, 푸른색 3가지가 있는데
　당신은 그 3가지 색 꽃을
　모두 모아 주시면 됩니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20576.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>这种花共有红、白、蓝３种颜色。
你的工作，就是要集齐
这３种颜色的花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20576.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>這種花共有紅、白、藍３種顏色。
你的工作，就是要集齊
這３種顏色的花。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20577.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>For your reward, we have a special battlemaster
headband  called a
<%sev_fee_item_a>.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20577.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「報酬には　<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>という
　バトルマスター専用の
　ヘッドバンドを　用意しております。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20577.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 보수로는 {%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A}|hpp(이라는,라는)
　배틀 마스터 전용
　헤어밴드를 준비했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20577.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>我这边准备了
<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>这种战斗大师专用的头带
作为报酬。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20577.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>我這邊準備了
<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>這種戰鬥大師專用的頭帶
作為報酬。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47403.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>What do you think? Will you collect the
moonlight flowers for us?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47403.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「……どうでしょう？
　３色の月光の花　集めてもらえますか？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47403.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: ……어떠십니까?
　3가지 색 꽃을 모아 와 주시겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47403.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>……怎么样？
能帮我收集３种颜色的月光花吗？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47403.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>……怎麼樣？
能幫我收集３種顏色的月光花嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

47404.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>We are offerinf a <%sev_fee_item_a> as your
reward. What do you think? Will you collect
the moonlight flowers for us?<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
47404.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「報酬には　<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>を
　用意しております。どうでしょう？
　３色の月光の花　集めてもらえますか？<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20578.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Ah I see that you have collected all three colors
of moonlight flowers. Now hand them over
please.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20578.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「どうやら　３色の　月光の花を
　集めてきていただけたようですね。
　さあ　こちらに　お渡しください。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20578.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 보아하니 3가지 달빛 꽃을
　모두 모으신 것 같군요.
　자, 제게 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20578.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>看来你已经集齐
３种颜色的月光花了。
把那些花给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20578.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>看來你已經集齊
３種顏色的月光花了。
把那些花給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20579.ja:
<pc>は　代理人に
３色の　月光の花を　渡した！
20579.zh-Hans:
<pc>把３色的月光花
交给了代理人！
20579.zh-Hant:
<pc>將３色的月光花
交給了代理人！

20580.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Great. I have indeed received it. Now he can
make his precious bouquet. Hmph.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20580.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「……確かに　受け取りました。
　これで　貴重な花束が　作れますよ。
　フフフフ……。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20580.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: ……똑똑히 받았습니다.
　이제 귀한 꽃다발을 만들 수 있겠어요.
　후후후후…….<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20580.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>……这些花我就收下了。
这样就能做珍贵的花束了，
呵呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20580.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>……這些花我就收下了。
這樣就能做珍貴的花束了，
呵呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20581.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Now, here is your reward as promised.
Please accept it with our thanks.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20581.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「それでは　こちらが　約束の報酬です。
　どうぞ　お受け取り下さい。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20581.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 이건 약속한 보수입니다.
　자, 받으시죠.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20581.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那么，我现在就给你说好的报酬，
请收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20581.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那麼，我現在就給你說好的報酬，
請收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.en:
The quest "<%sev_quest_name>"
has transgressed with finesse!<update_quedate><open_irai>
42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

20582.en:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>Now, if you will excuse me. I am very busy
and I must take my leave.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20582.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>「では　私は　これで
　失礼させていただきます。
　なにせ　忙しい身でしてね。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20582.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>: 그럼 전 이만 실례하겠습니다.
　이래저래 바빠서요.<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20582.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那我就
先离开了。
不好意思，我有很多事要忙。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20582.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01424 _normal m00001>那我就
先離開了。
不好意思，我有很多事要忙。<stop_lip_animation n01424 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20583.ja: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>「ガル……ガルルル……！<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20583.ko: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>: 크륵…… 크르르르……!<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20583.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>吼……吼哦哦哦……！<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20583.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>吼……吼喔喔喔……！<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20584.ja: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>「ガルルル……！　グルワーーッ！！<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20584.ko: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>: 크르르르……! 크아악~~!!<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20584.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>吼哦哦哦……！咕噜哇——！！<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20584.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m07100 _normal m00001>吼喔喔喔……！咕嚕哇──！！<stop_lip_animation m07100 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20585.en: <start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>Hang on a second!<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20585.ja: <start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「ちょいと　待ちなっ！<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20585.ko: <start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 잠깐 기다려!<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20585.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>你等一下！<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20585.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>你等一下！<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20586.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>Thanks. These guys look like they're out control.
It's probably best not to provoke them!<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20586.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「どうも　こいつら　正気じゃねーみてえだ。
　今は　下手に刺激しないほうが　いい！<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20586.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 이 녀석들, 아무래도 제정신이 아닌 것 같군.
　지금은 섣불리 자극하지 않는 게 좋겠어!<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20586.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>这些家伙看起来很不正常啊，
现在还是别随便刺激他们！<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20586.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>這些傢伙看起來很不正常啊，
現在還是別隨便刺激他們！<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20587.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>Hmm... It seems that the unique aroma
coming off you repels the Tortoceratops.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20587.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「……なるほど。アンタから臭ってくる
　独特の香りが　デンタザウルスを
　コーフンさせてるみたいだな。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20587.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군, 너한테서 나는
　독특한 향기가 덴타 사우루스를
　흥분시킨 모양이다.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20587.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>……原来如此，是你身上的
独特香味
让长钉甲龙亢奋了。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20587.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>……原來如此，是你身上的
獨特香味
讓長釘甲龍亢奮了。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20588.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>Hey no hard feelings now.
You gotta do what you gotta do!<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20588.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「とりあえず　緊急措置だ！
　悪く思うなよ。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20588.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 일단 응급조치를 취해야겠어!
　널 위한 거니 원망하지 말아 다오.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20588.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>总之，先采取紧急措施！
你别怪我哦。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20588.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>總之，先用緊急措施！
你別怪我喔。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20589.en:
Masked Buster smeared Manky Mud all
over <pc>!
20589.ja:
仮面バスターは　<pc>に
どくどくヘドロを　振りかけた！
20589.zh-Hans:
假面战师向<pc>
撒出毒毒淤泥！
20589.zh-Hant:
面具破壞者向<pc>
撒出毒毒淤泥！

20590.en:
A musky odor spread throughout the area and
the Tortoceratops dispersed like a fart in the wind!
20590.ja:
辺りに　きつい臭いが広がって
デンタザウルスたちは
クモの子を散らすように　逃げていった！
20590.ko:
주변에 지독한 냄새가 퍼지자
덴타 사우루스 무리는
뿔뿔이 흩어져 달아났다!
20590.zh-Hans:
一股刺鼻的臭味弥漫开来，
长钉甲龙们像逃难一样
四处逃窜！
20590.zh-Hant:
一股刺鼻的臭味瀰漫開來，
長釘甲龍們像逃難一樣
四處逃竄！

20591.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>Oh, you were collecting moonflowers.
I didn't know you had been contracted to do that.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20591.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「……ほう　月光の花集めね。
　そんな仕事を　頼まれてたのか。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20591.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: ……흐음, 달빛 꽃 모으기라.
　그런 의뢰를 받았단 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20591.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>……哦，收集月光花啊，
原来你被委托了那种事情。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20591.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>……喔，收集月光花啊，
原來你被委託了那種事情。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20592.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>Come to think of it, I've heard that the scent of
the three moonflowers attracts Tortoceratops.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20592.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「そういえば　聞いたことがあるぜ。
　３色の　月光の花の香りが　混じると
　デンタザウルスを　呼び寄せるってな。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20592.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 그러고 보니 들은 적이 있어.
　3가지 색 달빛 꽃의 향기를 섞으면
　덴타 사우루스를 유인할 수 있다고.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20592.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>这么说来，我也有听过，
只要把那３种颜色的月光花香混在一起，
就可以招来长钉甲龙。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20592.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>這麼說來，我也有聽過，
只要把那３種顏色的月光花香混在一起，
就可以招來長釘甲龍。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20593.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>But Tortoceratops aren't usually found in
these parts. I wonder how they got here...<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20593.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「おまけに　デンタザウルスってのは
　本来　この辺りには　いない魔物だ。
　どこから　まぎれ込んだのやら……。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20593.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 게다가 덴타 사우루스는
　원래 이 주변에 사는 마물이 아냐.
　대체 어디서 나타난 거지…….<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20593.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>而且，这一带原本不会有
长钉甲龙这种怪物出没，
真不知道它们是从哪里来的……<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20593.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>而且，這一帶原本不會有
長釘甲龍這種怪物出沒，
真不知道牠們是從哪裡來的……<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20594.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>You may be in some trouble. I smell more
than just flowers... I smell a conspiracy.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20594.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「どうやら　アンタ　何か面倒ごとに
　巻き込まれたみたいだな。
　こりゃ　陰謀の臭いが　プンプンするぜ。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20594.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 아무래도 너
　뭔가 성가신 일에 엮인 것 같은데.
　음모의 냄새가 나.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20594.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>我看你似乎是被卷进
某种麻烦事啰，
感觉这整件事充满了阴谋啊。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20594.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>我看你似乎是被捲進
某種麻煩事囉，
感覺這整件事充滿了陰謀啊。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20595.en:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>But first you should get cleaned up.
The smell of that Manky Mud is making my
eyes water.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20595.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>「だが　まずは　どくどくヘドロの臭いを
　どうにかすべきだな。ここにいると　
　鼻がひん曲がりそうなんで　オレは退散するよ。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20595.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>: 하지만 우선 독독뻘 냄새부터
　어떻게 하는 게 좋겠군. 여기 있다간
　코가 떨어져 나갈 것 같으니 난 이만 실례하마.<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20595.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>不过你还是先去处理一下
这身毒毒淤泥的臭味吧。我先闪人了，
再待下去鼻子就要受不了了。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20595.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01421 _normal m00001>不過你還是先去處理一下
這身毒毒淤泥的臭味吧。我先閃人了，
再待下去鼻子就要受不了了。<stop_lip_animation n01421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
